# Contributing to AI Factory

Thanks for your interest in contributing! This guide will help you get started.

## Prerequisites

- Node.js >= 18
- npm
- Git

## Setup

```bash
git clone https://github.com/lee-to/ai-factory.git
cd ai-factory

npm install
npm run build
```

To use your local build as a global CLI:

```bash
npm run link
```

## Development

```bash
# Build the project
npm run build

# Run tests
npm run test
```

## Reporting Issues

Open an issue at [github.com/lee-to/ai-factory/issues](https://github.com/lee-to/ai-factory/issues).
